title: The Best Deals From Appliances Online's Huge Birthday Sale
text:
Image: Supplied

Appliances Online is in the midst of an annual Birthday sale with up to 45% off select white goods and electronics. Available products include dishwashers, sinks, taps, fridges, freezers, washers, dryers, heating, TV, audio and electronics. Here are the highlights!

Appliances Online's birthday sale contains thousands of discounted bargains. To save you the trouble of sifting through everything, here are a few standout deals for your kitchen and laundry:

You can see the full sale over on the Appliances Online sales portal. But be quick - the sale ends at 11:59pm tonight.

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
